item.title: My Emacs Configuration
item.description: Table of Contents Introduction Meta Packages General Personal information Reduce filesystem clutter Cleanup UI Saner defaults Beacon Font Dashboard Theme Display battery in modeline Indent guides Cursorline Indentation Windows Relative line numbers Key chords Tools Terminal Emulator All The Icons Centaur Tabs Treemacs Undo Tree Magit Git Gutter Ivy Evil Mode Language Server lsp-mode lsp-ui XRefs Auto Complete Languages C++ Python Golang Haskell Javascript/Typescript Web File Types Org LaTeX Configuration Files Spelling Snippets Miscellaneous dz/functions Wrap org source code blocks Open configuration Introduction What follows is my literate emacs configuration.

item.title: Reversing Packet Tracer
item.description: Table of Contents Preface Reversing Stage 1: decryptPTSave Stage 2: decipher Stage 3: deobfuscateBytes Stage 4: qUncompress Putting it All Together Other Shenanigans Bypassing Login 100% Resources Preface As a high school IT student I find myself using Packet Tracer almost on a daily basis.
